values: Bonus: JD Vance with Megyn Kelly, on Democrats' Anti-Family Policies and Media Lies

We're bringing you a special bonus episode, highlighting our friend Megyn Kelly's podcast, The Megyn Kelly Show. Megyn interviewed Sen. JD Vance, GOP vice presidential nominee, to discuss the controversy this week about Vance's prior "childless cat ladies" comments, the Democrats' "anti-family" policies, the media and celebrities taking his pro-family comments out of context, and much more.
 
Subscribe and follow The Megyn Kelly Show:
